import React,{useState}from"react";import{supabase}from"../../lib/supabaseClient.js";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Login(){const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const[password,setPass]=useState("");const[msg,setMsg]=useState("");const onSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setMsg("Logging in...");const{error}=await supabase.auth.signInWithPassword({email,password});if(error)setMsg(error.message);else window.location.replace("/admin");// langsung ke Dashboard
};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container mt-10 max-w-md",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card p-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-xl font-bold mb-2",children:"Admin Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:onSubmit,className:"grid gap-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),className:"border rounded-xl px-3 py-2 dark:bg-slate-900",placeholder:"Email",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPass(e.target.value),className:"border rounded-xl px-3 py-2 dark:bg-slate-900",placeholder:"Password",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-primary",children:"Login"}),msg&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-sm text-slate-500",children:msg})]})]})});}
